lead_paragraph: Opener Stephen Cook scored a career-high century to help South Africa build a massive 432-run lead over Sri Lanka despite rain delays on the third day of the first test at St George's Park on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Cricket-Cook Century as South Africa Build Huge Lead
headline.main: Cricket-Cook Century as South Africa Build Huge Lead

snippet: Opener Stephen Cook scored a career-high century to help South Africa build a massive 432-run lead over Sri Lanka despite rain delays on the third day of the first test at St George's Park on Wednesday....
